official.headline: BCI Stabilization Talks
official.anchor_line: Harmonists engage with Civil Reformers to stabilize BCI effectively.
official.contextual_reframing: These collaborative efforts underscore our commitment to maintaining balance and continuity in governance.

underground.headline: BCI Under Scrutiny
underground.anchor_line: Harmonists cut deals to save failing BCI without bullets.
underground.contextual_reframing: Behind closed doors, they're tweaking algorithms to dodge disaster — who's really watching?
